fullSpecs.title: Camera details
items: LED flash (Brighter True Tone flash with slow sync)
Optical zoom in (2x), optical zoom out (2x)
Portrait mode with advanced bokeh and Depth Control

fullSpecs.title: Connectivity
items: GPS with A-GPS, GLONASS, Galileo and QZSS

fullSpecs.title: Features
items: Siri natural language commands and dictation

fullSpecs.title: Video
items: Slow motion video support for 1080p at 120fps or 240fps
Extended dynamic range for video up to 30 fps
Optical zoom in (2x), optical zoom out (2x)
Take 8MP still photos while recording 4K video
